程序包 structure

类 Point

java.lang.Object
structure.Point
public class Point
extends java.lang.Object
The is a class represent a piece's position in the chessboard the two elements x and y respectively represent the horizontal and vertical position Additionally, there are some helper methods to do some calculation on Point.

  • 字段概要

    字段 
    修饰符和类型 字段 说明
    int x  
    int y

    Initialize the Point object by two parameters

      public int x

    • y

      public int y

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Point

      public Point​(int x, int y)
      Initialize the Point object by two parameters
      参数:
      x - represent the horizontal coordinate of the piece
      y - represent the vertical coordinate of the piece

  • 方法详细资料

    • getLocation

      public static Point getLocation​(java.lang.String pieceName)
      This method is going to return the location based on the piece's name. Usually, it is used to search the location of a king, because there is only one king for one side.
      参数:
      pieceName - The Piece's name is going to be searched.
      返回:
      The Point location. Null, if not found.

    • isEnemy

      public static boolean isEnemy​(Cell p1, Cell p2)
      Decide whether two Cells on the board are enemies.
      参数:
      p1 - The first cell
      p2 - The second Cell
      返回:
      True if they are enemies. Otherwise, return false.

    • isEnemy

      public static boolean isEnemy​(Point p1, Point p2)
      Decide whether two Points on the board are enemies.
      参数:
      p1 - The first Point
      p2 - The second Point
      返回:
      True if they are enemies. Otherwise, return false.

    • equals

      public boolean equals​(java.lang.Object obj)
      Decide whether two Points are equal.
      覆盖:
      equals 在类中 java.lang.Object
      参数:
      obj - Another object
      返回:
      True if they are same.

    • findCheck

      public static Cell findCheck​(Point kLoc)
      This method is going to return which enemy piece is checking on my King.
      参数:
      kLoc - My king's location
      返回:
      The cell which is checking my king.

    • PointThreatFromPN

      public static Cell PointThreatFromPN​(Point kLoc)
      This function help us to know if the Point kLoc be threatened by enemy pawn
      参数:
      kLoc - means the current piece, kLoc have its coordinates
      返回:
      If kLoc do threatened by enemy pawn,we return the coordinates of the enemy coordinate

    • PointTreatFromKN

      public static Cell PointTreatFromKN​(Point kLoc)
      This function help us to know if the Point kLoc be threatened by enemy Knight
      参数:
      kLoc - means the current piece, kLoc have its coordinates
      返回:
      If kLoc do threatened by enemy Knight,we return the coordinates of the enemy coordinate

    • checkFromSelf

      public static boolean checkFromSelf​(Point kLoc, Point kLoc2)
      This method is going to figure out whether a piece from my side which can reach a specific location, exists.
      参数:
      kLoc - The targeting location
      kLoc2 - The location of my king
      返回:
      True if there is a piece in my side can reach kLoc. Otherwise, return false.

    • threatFromPorNSelf

      public static boolean threatFromPorNSelf​(Point kLoc, Point kLoc2)
      This function can help us know if the piece at kLoc can be threatened by own Pawn/Knight
      参数:
      kLoc - the current pieces coordinates
      kLoc2 - our King's real location
      返回:
      If kLoc do threaten by own pawn or Knight, then true; otherwise, false

    • check

      public static boolean check​(Point kLoc, Point kLoc2)
      This method is used to decide whether a piece is under attack.
      参数:
      kLoc - The location of the piece
      kLoc2 - The location of the king standing on the same side as kLoc
      返回:
      return true if the kLoc is under attack. False, if kLoc is safe.

    • inScale

      public static boolean inScale​(int x, int y)
      Check whether a location is in the scale of board.
      参数:
      x - The x-coordinate of a point
      y - The y-coordinate of a point
      返回:
      Ture is the point is in the scale

    • threatFromPorN

      public static boolean threatFromPorN​(Point kLoc, Point kLoc2)
      Check whether kLoc is under attack from a Knight or a Pawn
      参数:
      kLoc - The targeting point
      kLoc2 - The king's location in the kLoc's side
      返回:
      True if the kLoc is under attack from a Knight or a Pawn. Otherwise, return false.
